answers.answer: Diabetes is also has problems related to erectile dysfunction. As well as major depression and various narcotics or depressants and in some cases "speeders". I have also noticed that sometimes ED can be caused by past issues or emotional regression.. such as the sexually or mentally abused, other times it can be lack of exercise or action and can have a dramatic affect upon your libido which in turn will affect your sexual performance. The only way to get a determinable cause for the symptom would be to contact a professional, if a medical doctor does not seem to be helping then therapy could be an alternate source.. and take note that all ED symptoms are not always ED. And not all cases have the same cause or cure.

question: You may have ED because...you have taken any anti-depression or anti-anxiety meds in the past. it is well known that ED symptoms occur while using the meds, but thousands have discovered that the symptoms continue years after having stopped taking the meds...I just recently found out about this and i finally may have figured out why i still have ED years after i stopped taking paxil...Read more:http://ssri-side-effects.com/
title: You may have ED because...
